alert.note: Alert for Southern Front Range Including Sangre De Cristo Mountains, Wet Mountains, La Veta Pass; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 21 at 3:02PM MST until December 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect until 5 PM this afternoon for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 221, 222, 225, 229 and 230 which includes Teller and Fremont Counties, the Wets and Sangre De Cristo Mountains and the southern I-25 corridor of Huerfano and western Las Animas Counties... ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued from 10 AM Wednesday morning through 5 PM Wednesday afternoon for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 221, 222 and 229 which includes Teller, Fremont and Huerfano Counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 225 AND 230... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 225 and 230. * Winds...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...5 to 10 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Southern Front Range Including Sangre De Cristo Mountains, Wet Mountains, La Veta Pass; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
